Stop 4272 - Glamorgan Drive is closed due to urgent roadworks. Please use Stop 3074 - Oteha Valley Rd instead.
50B Bus Service Temporarily Suspended

Due to bus driver shortages, bus route 50B has been suspended until further notice. 
However, due to a technical error this service is still showing in Journey Planner as cancelled trips.
We hope to reinstate this service as soon as possible, and will notify customers when we have a confirmed date.

Rail Network Rebuild 2

All stations have re-opened. Due to stage 2 of KiwiRail’s Rail Network Rebuild, Onehunga services will run between Onehunga and Penrose at peak times and you will need to transfer at Penrose for Southern Line services to Britomart. During off-peak, all services will run from Onehunga to Britomart.
https://at.govt.nz/weatherwatch
